items.sentence: I'm almost certain Tom will get into the university of his choice.
I don't think Tom knows how many eggs his mother wants him to buy.
I don't think you need to tell Tom why Mary wasn't here yesterday.
I don't think you need to tell Tom why you weren't here on Monday.
I don't think that Tom would be willing to show me how to do that.
I don't think that Tom will be able to walk for two or three days.
I don't think Tom knows how many hours he's going to have to wait.
I suspect that Tom knows that Mary doesn't live in Boston anymore.
Do you think that there is any possibility that Tom could do that?
Do you think that there is any possibility that Tom would do that?
